title: Green Flower Friday With Max Simon
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Max Simon, a cannabis thought leader, founder and CEO of Green Flower Media joins Rena Sherbill to discuss our favorite green flower. We discuss improving quality of life through cannabis, the job growth in the industry, running cannabis companies like a CPG company and why 'what cannabis stock should I buy' isn't the right question. We also cover the power of education and destigmatizing the cannabis plant. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
